mapper.insert: insert into tal_cart(cart_id, member_id, product_id, product_count) values(seq_cart_id.nextval, #{member_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_count})
mapper.update: update tal_cart set product_Count=#{product_Count} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select a.cart_id, a.member_id, a.product_id, a.product_count, b.product_name, b.product_price, b.product_discount from tal_cart a left outer join tal_product b on a.product_id = b.product_id where member_Id = #{member_id} order by cart_id
select * from tal_cart where member_Id = #{member_Id} and product_id = #{product_id}
